# Stamper React Native App - Copilot Instructions

## Architecture Overview

- It's based on **Ignite boilerplate** (https://github.com/infinitered/ignite).

- The specification is in `spec.md` and the to-do list is in `todo.md`.

## Development

- To interact with the app use `mobile-mcp`.
- Always assume the Expo development is running and connect to the emulator.
